mapper.sql: MEMBER_ID, USERNAME, NICKNAME, FULLNAME, PHONE, SEX, PHOTO, WAITACCOUNT, ALREADYACCOUNT, WXOPEN_ID, FROMWXOPEN_ID, MEMBERTYPE_ID
mapper.select:
select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.WAITACCOUNT, m.ALREADYACCOUNT, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME from m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id where 1 = 1
and ( m.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.FULLNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.PHONE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and m.MEMBERTYPE_ID = #{pd.MEMBERTYPE_ID}
order by m.MEMBER_ID ASC

select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.WAITACCOUNT, m.ALREADYACCOUNT, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME from m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id where 1 = 1
and ( m.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.FULLNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.PHONE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and m.MEMBERTYPE_ID = #{MEMBERTYPE_ID}
order by m.MEMBER_ID ASC

select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.WAITACCOUNT, m.ALREADYACCOUNT, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, m.LEVEL, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME from ( select *,1 as level from member m where m.fromwxopen_id = #{WXOPEN_ID} UNION all select *,2 as level from member m where m.fromwxopen_id in (select wxopen_id from member m where m.fromwxopen_id = #{WXOPEN_ID}) ) m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id where 1 = 1
and ( m.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.FULLNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.PHONE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and m.MEMBERTYPE_ID = #{MEMBERTYPE_ID}
order by m.MEMBER_ID ASC

select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.WAITACCOUNT, m.ALREADYACCOUNT, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME from m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id order by m.WAITACCOUNT DESC
LIMIT 0,100

select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.WAITACCOUNT, m.ALREADYACCOUNT, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME, ifnull(t.COUNT,0) COUNT from m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id left join ( select m.member_id ,count(1) count from ((select m1.member_id from member m1 left join member m2 on m1.wxopen_id = m2.fromwxopen_id where m2.wxopen_id is not null ) UNION all (select m1.member_id from member m1 left join member m2 on m1.wxopen_id = m2.fromwxopen_id left join member m3 on m2.wxopen_id = m3.fromwxopen_id where m3.wxopen_id is not null ) ) m group by m.member_id ) t on m.member_id = t.member_id order by t.COUNT DESC
LIMIT 0,100
select MEMBERTYPE_ID, MEMBERTYPENAME from membertype order by MEMBERTYPE_ID asc

select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.WAITACCOUNT, m.ALREADYACCOUNT, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME from m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id where m.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}
